DOC.brief_summary: The study is to show the new salt formulation of GSK372475 is equivalent to the old salt formulation of GSK372475.
DOC.criteria: Healthy Males/Females aged 1845 years Nonsmokers BMI 1930 kg.m2 QTc<450msec Use of oral contraception Positive breath alcohol and drug screen Regular alcohol consumption Current psychiatric illness or within 1 year. History of GI, hepatic or renal disease Uncontrolled hypertension
